price: dostavljam vam poslanice Gospodara svoga i savjetujem vas; ja od Allaha znam ono što ne znate vi.
arabic: أُبَلِّغُكُمۡ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّي وَأَنصَحُ لَكُمۡ وَأَعۡلَمُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: uballighukum risālāti rabbī wa-anṣaḥu lakum wa-aʿlamu mina al-lahi mā lā taʿlamūna
